./model/vuln.model.pl

  • package VulnDB::RDBO
    • init_db
  • package main
  • package VulnDB::RDB

  • EOF
   1 #!/usr/bin/perl
   2 use strict;
   3 use warnings;
   4 
   5 BEGIN {
   6   package VulnDB::RDBO; $INC{"VulnDB/RDBO.pm"} = __FILE__;
   7   use base qw(Rose::DB::Object);
   8   sub init_db { shift; VulnDB::RDB->new }
   9   }
  10 
  11   BEGIN {
  12   package VulnDB::RDB; $INC{"VulnDB/RDB.pm"} = __FILE__;
  13   use base qw(Rose::DB);
  14 
  15   our $FILENAME = __FILE__ . ".sqlite";
  16 
  17   __PACKAGE__->register_db
  18     (driver => 'mysql',
  19      database => 'vulntracker_test',
  20      'host' => 'localhost',
  21      'username' => 'root',
  22      'password' => '1984',
  23     );
  24   unless (0 and -f $FILENAME) {
  25     __PACKAGE__->initialize_database;
  26   }
  27 
  28   sub initialize_database {
  29     my $class = shift;
  30     my $db = $class->new;
  31     die unless $db->driver eq "mysql";
  32     unlink $db->database;
  33     my $dbh = $db->dbh;
  34     $dbh->{RaiseError} = 0;
  35     $dbh->{PrintError} = 0;
  36     $dbh->do($_) or die "$DBI::errstr
  37             for $_" for split /\n{2,}/, <<'END_OF_SQL';
  38 
  39 CREATE TABLE `message_type` (
  40   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
  41   `name` varchar(25) NOT NULL,
  42   `desc` longtext NOT NULL,
  43   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
  44   UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`)
  45 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
  46 
  47 
  48 CREATE TABLE `source` (
  49   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
  50   `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  51   `email` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  52   `email_password` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  53   `email_server` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  54   `url` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  55   `desc` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  56   `desc_long` longtext NOT NULL,
  57   `message_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  58   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
  59   UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`,`message_type_id`),
  60   INDEX (`message_type_id`),
  61   FOREIGN KEY (`message_type_id`) REFERENCES `message_type`(`id`)
  62 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
  63 
  64 
  65 CREATE TABLE `message` (
  66   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
  67   `text` longtext NOT NULL,
  68   `subject` varchar(250) NOT NULL,
  69   `body` longtext NOT NULL,
  70   `message_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  71   `source_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  72   `is_processed` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  73   `is_mailed` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  74   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
  75   INDEX (`subject`),
  76   INDEX (`message_type_id`),
  77   FOREIGN KEY (`message_type_id`) REFERENCES `message_type`(`id`),
  78   INDEX (`source_id`),
  79   FOREIGN KEY (`source_id`) REFERENCES `source`(`id`)
  80 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
  81  
  82 
  83 CREATE TABLE `app` (
  84   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
  85   `name` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  86   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
  87   UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`)
  88 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
  89 
  90 -- --------------------------------------------------------
  91 
  92 -- 
  93 -- Table structure for table `app_version`
  94 -- 
  95 
  96 CREATE TABLE `app_version` (
  97   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
  98   `app_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  99   `version` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 100   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 101   INDEX (`app_id`),
 102   FOREIGN KEY (`app_id`) REFERENCES `app`(`id`)
 103 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 104 
 105 -- 
 106 -- Table structure for table `advisory`
 107 -- 
 108 
 109 CREATE TABLE `advisory` (
 110   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 111   `message_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 112   `app_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 113   `version` varchar(25) NOT NULL,
 114   `text` longtext NOT NULL,
 115   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 116   INDEX (`message_id`),
 117   FOREIGN KEY (`message_id`) REFERENCES `message`(`id`),
 118   INDEX (`app_id`),
 119   FOREIGN KEY (`app_id`) REFERENCES `app`(`id`)
 120 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 121 
 122 
 123 -- --------------------------------------------------------
 124 -- 
 125 -- 
 126 -- Table structure for table `criteria_type`
 127 -- 
 128 
 129 CREATE TABLE `criteria_type` (
 130   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 131   `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 132   `search_field` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
 133   `desc` longtext NOT NULL,
 134   `input_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 135   `criteria_pref_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL default 'advanced',
 136   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 137   UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`)
 138 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 139 
 140 -- --------------------------------------------------------
 141 
 142 CREATE TABLE `auth_user` (
 143   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 144   `username` varchar(30) NOT NULL,
 145   `first_name` varchar(30) NOT NULL,
 146   `last_name` varchar(30) NOT NULL,
 147   `email` varchar(75) NOT NULL,
 148   `password` varchar(128) NOT NULL,
 149   `is_staff` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
 150   `is_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
 151   `is_superuser` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
 152   `last_login` datetime NOT NULL,
 153   `date_joined` datetime NOT NULL,
 154   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 155   UNIQUE KEY `username` (`username`)
 156 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;
 157 
 158 
 159 
 160 CREATE TABLE `qualifier` (
 161   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 162   `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 163   `desc` varchar(150) NULL,
 164   `sql` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
 165   `rose` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 166   `rose_sql` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 167   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`)
 168 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 169 
 170 
 171 -- 
 172 -- Table structure for table `user_criteria`
 173 -- 
 174 
 175 CREATE TABLE `user_criteria` (
 176   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 177   `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 178   `criteria_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 179   `qualifier_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 180   `value` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 181   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 182   INDEX (`user_id`),
 183   FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `auth_user`(`id`),
 184   INDEX (`criteria_type_id`),
 185   FOREIGN KEY (`criteria_type_id`) REFERENCES `criteria_type`(`id`),
 186   INDEX (`qualifier_id`),
 187   FOREIGN KEY (`qualifier_id`) REFERENCES `qualifier`(`id`)
 188 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 189 
 190 -- --------------------------------------------------------
 191 
 192 -- Table structure for table `alert_method`
 193 -- 
 194 
 195 CREATE TABLE `alert_method` (
 196   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 197   `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 198   `desc` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
 199   `desc_long` longtext NOT NULL,
 200   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 201   UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`)
 202 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 203 
 204 -- --------------------------------------------------------
 205 
 206 
 207 
 208 -- 
 209 -- Table structure for table `user_profile`
 210 -- 
 211 
 212 CREATE TABLE `user_profile` (
 213   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 214   `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 215   `where_heard` varchar(250) NOT NULL,
 216   `criteria_pref_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL default 'simple',
 217   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 218   UNIQUE KEY `user_id` (`user_id`),
 219   UNIQUE KEY `user_profile_user_id` (`user_id`),
 220   INDEX (`user_id`),
 221   FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `auth_user`(`id`)
 222 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 223 
 224 -- --------------------------------------------------------
 225 
 226 CREATE TABLE `user_messages` (
 227   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 228   `userprofile_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 229   `message_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 230   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 231   UNIQUE KEY `userprofile_id` (`userprofile_id`,`message_id`),
 232   INDEX (`userprofile_id`),
 233   FOREIGN KEY (`userprofile_id`) REFERENCES `user_profile`(`id`),
 234   INDEX (`message_id`),
 235   FOREIGN KEY (`message_id`) REFERENCES `message`(`id`)
 236 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 237 
 238 
 239 -- 
 240 -- Table structure for table `user_sources`
 241 -- 
 242 
 243 CREATE TABLE `user_sources` (
 244   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 245   `userprofile_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 246   `source_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 247   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 248   UNIQUE KEY `userprofile_id` (`userprofile_id`,`source_id`),
 249   INDEX (`userprofile_id`),
 250   FOREIGN KEY (`userprofile_id`) REFERENCES `user_profile`(`id`),
 251   INDEX (`source_id`),
 252   FOREIGN KEY (`source_id`) REFERENCES `source`(`id`)
 253 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 254 
 255 -- --------------------------------------------------------
 256 
 257 -- 
 258 -- Table structure for table `user_alert_methods`
 259 -- 
 260 
 261 CREATE TABLE `user_alert_methods` (
 262   `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 263   `userprofile_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 264   `alertmethod_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
 265   PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
 266   UNIQUE KEY `userprofile_id` (`userprofile_id`,`alertmethod_id`),
 267   INDEX (`userprofile_id`),
 268   FOREIGN KEY (`userprofile_id`) REFERENCES `user_profile`(`id`),
 269   INDEX (`alertmethod_id`),
 270   FOREIGN KEY (`alertmethod_id`) REFERENCES `alert_method`(`id`)
 271 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
 272 
 273 
 274 -- --------------------------------------------------------
 275 
 276 
 277 END_OF_SQL
 278   }
 279 
 280   if ("use loader") {
 281     require Rose::DB::Object::Loader;
 282     my $loader = Rose::DB::Object::Loader->new
 283       (db_class => __PACKAGE__,
 284        base_class => 'VulnDB::RDBO',
 285        class_prefix => 'VulnDB::RDBO',
 286       );
 287     my @classes = $loader->make_classes;
 288 
 289     if ("show resulting classes") {
 290       foreach my $class (@classes) {
 291         print "#" x 70, "\n";
 292         if ($class->isa('Rose::DB::Object')) {
 293           print $class->meta->perl_class_definition;
 294         } else {                # Rose::DB::Object::Manager subclasses
 295           print $class->perl_class_definition, "\n";
 296         }
 297       }
 298     }
 299   }
 300 }
